mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enchashment ( agency_id, enchashment_type, money, weixin, alipay, bankno, approve_status, create_datetime ) VALUES ( #{agencyId}, #{enchashmentType}, #{money}, #{weixin}, #{alipay}, #{bankno}, 1, GETDATE() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE enchashment
approve_status = #{approveStatus},
approve_datetime = GETDATE()
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ISNULL(sum(money), 0) FROM enchashment WHERE agency_id = #{agencyId} AND enchashment_type = #{enchashmentType}
